          <title>
            <string language="en">Condensation reaction for the formation of disaccharides from two glucose</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kondensationreaktion für die Anordnung der 
Disaccharide von Glukose zwei</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réaction de condensation pour la formation des 
disaccharides du glucose deux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reação da condensação para a formação dos 
disaccharides do glucose dois</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reazione di condensazione per la formazione dei 
disaccaridi da glucosio due</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίδραση συμπύκνωσης για το σχηματισμό 
disaccharides από τη γλυκόζη δύο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reacción de la condensación para la formación 
de disacáridos a partir de la glucosa el dos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the equation for the condensation reaction between two glucose to form disaccharides.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">disaccharides</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">glucose</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">monosaccharides</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reaction equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Gleichung für die 
Kondensationreaktion zwischen Glukose zwei zu den 
Formulardisacchariden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'équation pour la 
réaction de condensation entre le glucose deux aux disaccharides de 
forme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a equação para a 
reação da condensação entre o glucose dois aos disaccharides do 
formulário.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'equazione per la 
reazione di condensazione fra glucosio due ai disaccaridi della forma.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την εξίσωση για την 
αντίδραση συμπύκνωσης μεταξύ της γλυκόζης δύο να διαμορφωθούν 
disaccharides.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la ecuación para la 
reacción de la condensación entre la glucosa dos a los disacáridos 
de la forma.</string>
          </description>
